remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction (weak version). (Unnecessary distinct variable restrictions were removed by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
ovig.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ovig.2 $e |- ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) -> E* z ph ) $.
ovig.3 $e |- F = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) /\ ph ) } $.
ovig $p |- ( ( A e. R /\ B e. S /\ C e. D ) -> ( ps -> ( A F B ) = C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ps x y z $.
